https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/rmIpIU3nieLdJCzewOtM1rdAl1w.jpg A sudden tsunami came as a shock, trapping Jiang Peng and his daughter, Jiang Xiao Hu, in Chinatown of Southeast Asia. The two of them, with other inhabitants, took a brace to fight against the terrible monster that followed. However, after the life-and-death struggle, they found surprisingly a man-made calamity instead of a natural disaster. Crazy Tsunami
